text: GMA New Media is a mass media company which makes mobile applications. They were founded on Jan 1, 2000 in the Philippines. They are headed up by Felipe Gozon, and are headquartered in the GMA Network Center.

GMA New Media, led by Felipe Gozon, is a mobile app creating media company. Established on New Years Day of the new millennium, the company provides Internet services. Philippine Entertainment Portal and Digify Inc are just two of the company’s subsidiaries.

The 29,000 employee building materials company Trane, the manufacturer of HVAC, which was founded in La Crosse, Wisconsin, is located in Swords, Dublin, Ireland.
Trane was founded in La Crosse, Wisconsin on 01-01-1913 but has since moved to Swords, Dublin in Ireland. Trane's 29,000 employees are involved in the manufacturing of HVAC building materials.

Trane, Inc., an international company in the building materials industry, was founded in La Crosse, Wisconsin in 1913. Today 29,000 people are employed by Trane, whose corporate headquarters are located in Swords, Dublin, Ireland. Trane is best known for manufacturing heating, ventilating and air conditioning (HVAC) systems.
